Check out the K53 SA App, I used it to learn for my learner\'s and driver\'s license.\nGet it free at https://k53sa.co.za/
An error occurred when redirecting to rate the app
K53 Tests is the most popular FREE Learner\'s license app in South Africa, Thousands have tried it and thousands have passed.
K53 Signs and Controls is the most popular FREE Signs and Controls app in South Africa.
Learn every road sign you can find on the road, know its name, areas where the road sign can be found, purpose and actions you should take.
Learn the rules that apply when crossing or entering a road or traffic lane. Know the general rules of a driver/rider, pedestrians right away and much more.
Learn the name and the description of the controls, which are found in the light motor vehicle, heavy motor vehicle and metorcycle.
Learn different types of road signs like warning, guidance, regulatory and temporary signs.
Regulatory signs are used to regulate the actions of road users.
Warning signs are used to alert drivers to dangerous situations on or bordering the roadway.
Guidance signs are provided to help navigate our increasingly complex and developing road network.
Nearly all road signs can be used in either a permanent or temporary form. Temporary signs are identical to the permanent signs except for one major detail - they have a yellow background color.
Road markings, painted on the roads surface in white, red, or yellow, like road signs must be obeyed. Disobeying of road markings could also result in serious collisions endangering road users.
Learn which controls to use in order to move from point A to B, controls for parking, controls for turning a corner, and many more.
